"A.P.242/3/5": "What gives! You're awfully saucy for someone smaller than me!"

"〔What?!〕〔It is you〕
〔who is small!〕"
"Anyone with eyes could tell I'm the bigger one here!"
"Don't butt in here, Sara! Oh, it's you!"
"Sara went off to perform solitary surveillance! But more importantly, back me up here!"

"〔Oh!〕〔Good timing!〕
〔<%me> will〕〔surely silence〕
〔the little one!〕"
"Whoooo are you calling small?! How many times must I explain to you that you're miniscule compared to me!"
"I can't take this anymore! You, tell us what you think!"
"Rela's the smaller one."
"Smaller is cuter."

"〔Even you〕〔think so?〕
〔I am〕〔the smaller one...〕"

"〔...Ah.〕〔I suppose〕
〔I am〕〔small now...〕"
"O-Oh... I wasn't asking about your tastes, but I suppose it was my fault for asking..."

"〔Yes,〕〔I see!〕
〔Tiny ARKS,〕〔look well,〕
〔and see〕〔who is smaller!〕"
"Whoa!"

"〔How was that?〕
〔Now〕〔you see〕〔I am〕
〔the bigger one!〕"
"H-Hmph! I never said being bigger was better! There are many benefits to being small!"
"〔Oh,〕〔are there?〕"
"Y-Yes! Of course!"
"〔What kinds of〕〔benefits are there?〕"
"Wh-What kinds? Let's see... T-That's right!"
"You can move around quickly during battle! Being smaller in size makes you a smaller target for enemy attacks as well!"
"Your sharp movements make you accurate, dependable, and swift! You can give anyone a good beating!"

"〔I see!〕〔Certainly,〕
〔when we〕〔were at the grave...〕"

"〔Your attacks〕〔against〕
〔the enemy〕〔were very precise!〕"
"Hmhmm! Exactly! That was like a walk in the park for someone like myself!"

"〔Being small is〕〔amazing!〕
〔What else?〕〔Surely〕
〔there are〕〔other benefits?〕"
"O-Other things? Well... H-Hey! You must know some of them!"
"Umm... Other things, yeah! You d-don't have to worry about... hitting your head on the ceiling!"

"〔That is〕〔great!〕
〔I am always〕〔hitting my head!〕
〔What else?〕〔What else?〕"
"And another thing! Since your body is so small, it only takes a mere two donuts to fill you up!"

"Although, because you get full so quickly, you
can't really eat large portions of tasty food..."
"〔That is〕〔unfortunate...〕"

"However! People sometimes give you candy if
you're small!"

"〔Amazing!〕〔Incredible!〕
〔Being small is〕〔stupendous!〕
〔Very well!〕"

"〔Now I too〕
〔will receive〕〔candy!〕"
"That's right!"
"Now, <%me>! Don't hold back, shower us small ones with as much candy as possible!"
"〔Shower us!〕"
